content.text: One-time use items. Most cost 1 AP to use (Quick Items = free).
Medical
Item Weight Cost Effect
Med Patch 0 25 cr Heal 1d6 HP. Quick Action. 1 per encounter limit.
Trauma Kit 1 100 cr Heal 2d6 HP. Requires Act. Can be used on others.
Combat Stim 0 75 cr +2 accuracy on all attacks for 2 rounds. Then -1 to all checks for 1 round (crash).
Detox Hypo 0 150 cr Immediately clear 1d4 Toxicity. +1 Stress.
Anti-Venom 0 50 cr Clear all Poison stacks. Quick Action.
Adrenaline 0 200 cr If used on a Shot contractor at 0 HP, they immediately stabilize at 1 HP. Does not prevent the Scar.
Nerve Blocker 0 50 cr Suppress one Scar debuff for 24 hours. Does not remove the Scar. ----------------- ----------------- ----------------- -----------------
Combat
Item Weight Cost Effect
Frag Grenade 0 75 cr 3d6 damage to all targets in Adjacent cluster. Thrown (Close range).
Flashbang 0 50 cr All targets in Adjacent cluster must check Grit DC 7 or be Dazed for 1 round.
Smoke Grenade 0 40 cr Creates Obscured zone for 3 rounds. Blocks line of sight.
Rift Flare 0 100 cr 2d8 magic damage to all targets in Adjacent cluster. +1 Toxicity to user.
EMP Charge 0 150 cr Disables all Tech-tagged weapons and augments in Adjacent cluster for 2 rounds.
Trap Mine 1 125 cr Place during prep. First creature entering the space takes 4d6 damage.
Glue Bomb 0 60 cr Target must spend 1 AP to break free (Chrome DC 6). Immobilized until then. ----------------- ----------------- ----------------- -----------------
Utility
Item Weight Cost Effect
Rift Compass 0 200 cr +1 to Navigation checks in rifts. Detects rift boundaries within Close range.
Toxicity 0 150 cr Read your own or Scanner another’s Toxicity level. Normally only corps have these.
Signal Flare 0 20 cr Visible for miles. Calls attention (for better or worse).
Climbing Kit 1 75 cr +2 to Athletics checks for climbing. Required for vertical surfaces DC 8+.
Lockpick Set 0 100 cr Required for Subterfuge checks to pick locks. +1 to the check.
Portable 0 30 cr Illuminates Light Adjacent area. Lasts 8 hours.
Rift Anchor 1 500 cr Stabilizes a wild rift entrance for 1 hour. Prevents collapse during extraction.
Comm Unit 0 75 cr Team communication within 1 mile. Encrypted (basic).
Advanced Comm 0 300 cr Team communication Unit within 5 miles. Encrypted (military-grade). Works across rift boundaries.
Specimen 2 200 cr Safely contains one Container Small rift creature or biological sample. Required for capture contracts without a Specimen Transport vehicle.
Grapple 1 250 cr Fires a grapple Launcher line up to Close range. Reusable.
Portable 3 400 cr Allows basic Workshop crafting and repairs in the field. -1 to checks compared to a proper Workshop.

Breather Mask 0 100 cr Filters airborne toxins. Reduces Toxicity gain from ambient exposure by 1 per encounter (minimum 0). Does not protect against channeled magic toxicity. ----------------- ----------------- ----------------- -------------------
Pre-packaged loadouts for specific mission types. Buying the kit is cheaper than the individual items.
